data.title: Croatian President Mesic and Prime Minister Racan are escorted by Secretary Cohen to the Pentagon River Parade Field.
data.text: Croatian President Stjepan Mesic (left) and Prime Minister Ivica Racan (right) are escorted by Secretary of Defense William S. Cohen (center) to the Pentagon River Parade Field for an armed forces full honors arrival ceremony on Aug. 8, 2000. Mesic, Racan and Cohen will later meet to discuss general regional security issues of interest to both nations.
